title: Personal Website
description: This is my **personal website and portfolio hub**, featuring a blog and showcasing various personal interests with occasional progress updates.

title: CGPP E-Apply
description: I developed the **HR/administrative sections** of the LGU City Government of Puerto Princesa's online job portal. Collaborating on this project, which included a public-facing view built by a colleague, significantly **streamlined the recruitment process** and directly enhanced the local government's operational efficiency.

title: CGPP LTS
description: This **Legislative Tracking System** archives finished legislation for Puerto Princesa City Government. *Future updates* will add creation, approval, and *real-time tracking* of legislative processes, enhancing efficiency and transparency.

title: CGPP Centralized Data System
description: The *Centralized Data System* centralizes and manages shared data (offices, divisions, users) for all LGU Puerto Princesa web systems. It offers **APIs for data retrieval and unified login**, while its **dashboard** allows administrators to manage systems, user roles, and permissions, streamlining data governance and access across the city government's digital ecosystem.

title: Palawena Travel and Tours | Admin Dashboard
description: For Palawena Travel and Tours, I **collaborated with a team** and I was assigned the **admin dashboard** section, integrating essential APIs for booking data and PayPal payments to streamline operations.
